ygData.subject: Re: Is there anyone out there still on this list?  No bugs here.
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats True! Too True! I have walked from Erudin To Freeport (using that boat also, of course) at least 20 times. I just hate to get to a dungeon that is a long
ygData.messageBody:
Thats True! Too True!

I have walked from Erudin To Freeport (using that boat also, of
course) at least 20 times. I just hate to get to a dungeon that is a long
run away (..paw...) and getting encumbered with goods to sell and having no
merchant under 15-20 minutes walking distance. Im like the NIKE poster boy
for Paladins. Air-Templar's..
hehe


PS- Thanks to all who turned out for the RunnyEye Clearing (Veeshan
Server)!!!

-Dyce


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Daniel C. Daugherty [SMTP:daniel@...]
> Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 3:05 PM
> To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Is there anyone out there still on this
> list? No bugs here.
>
> From: "Daniel C. Daugherty" <daniel@...>
>
> I enjoy seeing the land.. I just like to see it once each time out... I
> enjoy walking there.. its the return trip thats a pain. Especially when
> luggin all that great junk I find back with me. Sanford and Son has
> nothing
> on me.....
>
>
